website_summaries.verdict: Cleans and remove deposits from your entire fuel system to prevent engine surges, stalling, hesitation, and power loss.
pros: One 11-ounce can treats up to 20 gallons of fuel
Thoroughly cleans fuel injectors, intake valves, ports, and combustion chambers for an end-to-end rehabilitation
BG 44K is excellent at restoring old engines by removing carbon deposits, but it can improve performance of newer engines as well
Contains no alcohol and is compatible with all fuel system materials
cons: Comes in a can rather than a resealable or closable bottle, which can make storage messy

customer_reviews.title: Best Fuel Additive Ever
customer_reviews.text: Best thing for fuel injectors ever invented. Litterally saved me from replacing them in a car I owned many years back. I run it in all of my cars twice a year with a full tank of super. Keep things nice and clean and running smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeFan

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or money with Lucas, Mystery or Seafoam
customer_reviews.text: Unlike most of the fuel treatment snake oil that is on the market, this stuff is the real deal! I've used this on a few of my machines and every treatment leaves it noticeably better. This is important to note, that unlike other treatments that you can use multiple times, I would not recommend doing so with this product! It's highly potent and honestly, if 44k doesn't clear it with one treatment, your issue requires some dismantling of components to resolve your problem. This is a 1x a year (at the most) treatment.
customer_reviews.author: jahdhfdhfajk

customer_reviews.title: ... technician and they'll all tell you there is NOTHING better than this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Ask any ASE certified technician and they'll all tell you there is NOTHING better than this stuff! Yeah, its expensive, but will save you money. I had an emissions issue w/ check engine light and I work at a repair shop. I asked my guys, individually, and all 3 techs (the best I've encountered in my career) said add this and a tank of super unleaded. They turned off my light and it has not come back on nor do I expect it to.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: This has to be the best fuel injector cleaner I have used
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the best fuel injector and top piston cleaner I have used I tried this because I hated a pinging noise my old subaru impreza was making and I couldn't figure out why because I only use premium gasoline after a can of this the engine pinging went away I'm really impress this stuff actually works.
customer_reviews.author: TONY SOPRANO

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Used twice in my 2010 Mini Cooper S and I have seen immediate improvements. Highly recommend if you have high mileage on your car and not ready to trade for a new car. This will get you over the hump for a little while longer.
customer_reviews.author: R. P.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Incredible, smells like rocket fuel.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried em all.....and this BG44K Power Enhancer is the best product I've ever used. This is STRONG stuff. You need to open this in a well ventilated area. The process for this is to add to a 1/4 tank of gas, pour entire product in, fill up with full tank of gas (preferably Tier 1). Once the tank gets to 1/2, fill up again.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Green

customer_reviews.title: Actually works!!
customer_reviews.text: Works! None of the other snake oil additives do anything for engines. This stuff works. This is the only product used at dealerships. I use it and also have my Honda dealership perform the services that these products offer through the dealership. Most people don't even know about it. It works!! Don't waste money on crap like Lucas or Sea Foam. That crap is a joke!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Lunsford

customer_reviews.title: What an amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I thought many of the reviews were just over exaggerated but man was I wrong! After my second fill up, that's when I REALLY noticed the difference! My gas mileage increased and miraculously, my Check Engine light vanished, which was giving me a catalytic converter code originally. What an amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: D. Charles

customer_reviews.title: Not everybody knows that but I usually get 5-10% worse gas mileage in the winter than I do in ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm at the end of the tank of gas I added this to and I already appear to have picked up a 2mpg improvement, but it's also April in Wisconsin which means we're likely switching from winter to summer fuels. Not everybody knows that but I usually get 5-10% worse gas mileage in the winter than I do in the summer from the fuel alone. I can't tell if my MPG increase is from this product being added or from the switch back to summer fuel. I'll update again with my findings with the next few tanks of gas.
customer_reviews.author: Just me...

customer_reviews.title: Way better than SeaFoam!!!
customer_reviews.text: My Discovery II was idling rough so after some research I bought this. I poured in and after 2 days I could already tell a difference. A changed the oil 500 miles after adding the cleaner and it made a huge difference. I'm going to make this bi-yearly maintenance on my Rover!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Holton

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Been using this in a 2007 Toyota FJ ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Been using this in a 2007 Toyota FJ Cruiser after reviewing early service records from Toyota dealership and noticed this is what they used at each oil change when performing the service. Now that I do it all myself I intend to carry on this process. Slight noticeable increase in throttle response and miles per gallon if any but the engine seems to be running smoother and accelerating smoother as well. I am using this product in combination with BG CF5 Fuel System Treatment, alternating between the two products every couple of fuel fill ups.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy Fuel Injector Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me by a friend who owns an automotive repair shop. I tried it in a 2000 Toyota Sienna that had bogged down, laggy acceleration. Within a couple miles the van started to accelerate like it was new. I put some in my Dirt Bike and F100 which I drive occasionally and both are easier to start and stop stumbling quickly due to less old fuel gum in the carbs. I put it in all my vehicles now. I run the tanks down about half way and then refuel a few times to keep the cleaner in the tank longer. Great stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: daddydaddy

customer_reviews.title: Second time buying
customer_reviews.text: Bought one time before and didn't read the directions. Added it to 30 gal. of gas and didn't have results as to be expected. I had a misfire going on 2 months, new plugs, new coils, new injectors...then new crate engine. After the new engine was installed, it ran smooth for about 2 months, then the misfire came back. "Treats up to 20 gallons". Added to 15 gallons today and smooth running all day.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Very strong cleaner, the best highend cleaner in the market imo
customer_reviews.text: I have used other high-end expensive fuel system cleaner including redline si-1, royal purple and amsoil. I felt like this one really did the job at removing a lot of carbon and junk from my engine. No wonder most dealership uses this stuff for their tune up. However I wouldn't use this as a maintenance product, I would recommend cheaper option like techron for that.
customer_reviews.author: butter123

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stuff
customer_reviews.text: I bought this, as my Mercedes mechanic recommended this for my CLK 430. At the time, I had well over 160,000 miles on the car, and it had not hurt my car's engine. I highly recommend BG products, a bit pricey, but totally worth it. I had read a review where the reviewer mentioned that oil levels dropped after usage, and I experienced the same. As the sludge in the pistons, etc gets cleaned out by this stuff, some new nooks and crannies are introduced. So, I just checked my levels more often. If I had not got into an accident at 235,000 miles, I would still have kept the car, and still used the product, once every 4-6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Porsche experience
customer_reviews.text: The previous owner of my 2015 Porsche Boxster ran it with regular gas, a no no. It hesitated on acceleration and lacked full potential. I tried one can and saw improvement, but still some hesitation. After that tank of gas was gone, I refilled and added another can. At the end of that tank of gas, it was much smoother and my gas mileage improved 10 to 15%. I'm very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Shortie

customer_reviews.title: Major improvement
customer_reviews.text: My fuel injectors were clogged to the point that I couldn't redline. The first drive after adding this to my fuel cleared up all issues I had with redlining and gained low end power that was previously lost. 2005 RX8.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but does the job
customer_reviews.text: I use a 2016 yamaha R6 for daily commute to work (~30 min each way). Use to get 42-45 mpg. After using this (accidentally added twice more than recommended) I felt a bit twitchy on the throttle but after a tank of gas, I felt a slight enhancement in power. I was surprised to get 52 mpg on the second and around 50 mpg for next three tank refills. Just used this once. Disappointed with the packaging as its hard to pour and once opened you have to use it all.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: To reduce carbon deposits
customer_reviews.text: This product has been on the market for decades. At one point years ago it was only sold at dealership, no auto part stores sold the product. My first encounter was I had a spark knock that would not go away. High octane gas , colder spark plugs, new spark plug wires and on & on but same noted condition. Then a friend offered me a can of 44K within use of a quarter tank of gas the knock no longer existed. Yes, it is not cheap but it works. Glen
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still the industry leader for fuel injector cleaning
customer_reviews.text: BG44K is the fuel injector cleaner that dealerships use. My brother worked for Lexus of Dallas and they would only use this product for the dealership fuel injector service. It works fast and you will notice improvement within five miles after adding to your gas tank. This price on Amazon is competitive. BG44K is expensive compared to Chevron Te*****n but works three times better.
customer_reviews.author: Byron J. Guidry

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using 44K for over 20 years, I love the stuff. I used it when I worked as a line mechanic as part of the 30 thousand mile service, and have been using it in my personal vehicles as well. I use a little in my Harley every 10 thousand miles or so to keep the carburetor clean, use it in my 2009 Mustang GT to keep the injectors and valves clean. It is not cheap, but neither is its value.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Dana

customer_reviews.title: Good to use every few months
customer_reviews.text: I rarely drive my car on the highway and use it predominently in city driving. My car was "coughing" and my mechanic used this to clean out the gas line. It worked and I've been buying it ever since.
customer_reviews.author: N. Iwasaki

customer_reviews.title: Works better than any other fuel additive cleaner I’ve used
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the best sneak away or so to say that I’ve used it could’ve been placebo but I felt like I noticed a difference actually after using this product it didn’t last long but it definitely worked while in the gas tank. Supposedly this is why a lot of shops use and they do not sell it in stores. I would recommend this over any other fuel additive cleaner
customer_reviews.author: Dabloesco

customer_reviews.title: Noticeable difference in just 2 treatments
customer_reviews.text: Mechanic recommended and having direct injection fuel system carbon buildup is an issue. I’ve treated twice with couple hundred miles in between treatments and can tell the difference. Throttle response is better, engine runs smoother and gas mileage improved. Far superior than seafoam and other treatments at local parts store. BG customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Pelletier

customer_reviews.title: WOW! It actually works!
customer_reviews.text: Used on a 2008 Tahoe LTZ with a 5.3l and wow did this stuff wake it up! Smoothed our the idle. Engine isn’t jerky when shifting under hard acceleration. Have tried tons of different treatments throughout the years with minimal luck. This stuff is the real deal! This will be my go-to for now on made the Tahoe fun to drive again!
customer_reviews.author: Mister D

customer_reviews.title: P420 code disappears
customer_reviews.text: I use this just once a year and to be perfectly honest I haven't noticed much difference in how my car runs but for the price it can't hurt. What I have notice is it prolongs the time that my engine light goes on and I have to reset my engine light due to a P420 catalytic below threshold level which only means your catalytic converter is no longer running as efficiently as it did new, my mechanic tells me thats not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Good fuel system cleaner
customer_reviews.text: As far as I can tell it's worked. Engine feels a little peppier, only so much you can get out of an old Toyota four banger with 206K miles. It brought compression back up to normal on my brother's Jeep and has held for the past 8 months.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: This was recommended by a friend who works on high end race ...
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by a friend who works on high end race cars. I used it on my 2009 Toyota Camry with 125,000 miles. It works great! In 1/2 tank i have had more response on the throttle! I have to watch my speed now! A lot more pep! This stuff works!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deb S.

customer_reviews.title: It worked well on my off lease Tacoma
customer_reviews.text: It worked well on my off lease Tacoma. I didt like the can opening and had to buy a funnel. You DONT want to spill this stuff on your paint or the driveway!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Bob Walton

customer_reviews.title: Works for me.
customer_reviews.text: I drive a 2014 2.4L Honda Accord with about 65,000 on odometer. I wasn't having any particular problems, but just wanted to try a can to see if I can notice any difference. As far as power goes I noticed nothing in particular. However, my mileage easily jumped by 1 to 2 mpg on my next two tank fill ups with air temps in the same range as before using treatment. I'll be purchasing another can for my wife's car.
customer_reviews.author: S Burns

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm - huge MPG boost!
customer_reviews.text: I always thought fuel additives were an unnecessary rip-off, but in desperation to try and solve persistently poor mpg in my daily driver, a splurged on a bottle. Incredibly, I went from about 18 MPG to 23 MPG after use! I don't know if it was a fluke (I will keep monitoring my MPG), but I have never seen 23 MPG, and I check my MPG after every fill up. If I even get half of that boost consistently, this is the best return on investment I have had in a long, long time. UPDATE: The effect was temporary - MPG returned to previous level soon after.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dryden

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Can!
customer_reviews.text: I used it because my gas gauge in my C5 Corvette was not reading properly. After, everything worked as it should and couldn't be happier. I've also used it in a C6 that wasn't driven much and would highly recommend it to anyone that needs to clean out their fuel system. Note: You will need some sort of funnel to use this!
customer_reviews.author: SeanH

customer_reviews.title: As good ass they say!
customer_reviews.text: My old, high-mileage engine was developing a pronounced knock going up hills or when accelerating on the highway, so I tried this. Wow! I've driven less than half the tank and the knock is almost gone! This stuff is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: R.H.

customer_reviews.title: This will save cost of injector replacement
customer_reviews.text: My Benz was idling rough cause I just zip around town. Engineer friend told me to go 60 mil outside OKC to buy this brand. Of course Amazon had it , delivered quick too. After 1 tank treatment, MB runs smooth as silk.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Petrie

customer_reviews.title: Will do extensive harm to your vehicle,
customer_reviews.text: Used this product in full tank of gas, ignition coil ,spark plugs,plug wires all were replaced, about 2 month prior. Drove pickup 143 miles , called tow truck, Never had issues with Lucas additive, thought I would try a more expensive, assumed better product on a ford ranger 4.0 with 151,000 miles on motor, Huge mistake, DO NOT USE !!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Pauls

customer_reviews.title: Worked great! Car running much smoother now.
customer_reviews.text: Before using this product our car was running/ idling very rough. After running this product for a few days and 1 tank of gasoline, rough idle and rough running engine is about 90% better. I’m going to order 1 more can and see if that gets it to 100% better.
customer_reviews.author: Peter R

customer_reviews.title: Not so sure it works as described
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps another snake oil. I ran this through my wife's '05 Xterra that has 135k on it and didn't notice any difference. Maybe there wasn't anything there that needed cleaned out, who knows. I have never ran any cleaners through her vehicle since we bought it in '07.
customer_reviews.author: B. Allgeier

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is GREAT!! Is better than Seafoam and Techtron
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is GREAT, works like a champ, I had issues with my 2006 Colorado, misfires, even after I changed Sparkplugs and coils, so I added a can of this stuff and OMG, the engine misfires and shaking went away. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: PEDRO A. REYESLOZADA

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $
customer_reviews.text: This product works better than any fuel cleaner I've ever used. I had 2004 Trailblazer that the mechanic wanted to perform over $800.00 worth of fuel injector cleaning and rebuilding. Use a can of this and the check engine light disappeared and the car runs better. It may need the injector service eventually, but that was over a year ago.
customer_reviews.author: TroyCuivreRidge

customer_reviews.title: Unbelivable
customer_reviews.text: My wife's 08 Ford Edge had a hesitation every so often. It just had plugs replaced a few years agp but its at 125k so I figured injector issues. I figured I'd give this a try, definitely cheaper than new injectors. We haven't had any issues since we used this product on a full tank. I'm going to buy another for my 03 wrangler next!
customer_reviews.author: jeeper

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. My 2013 Jeep Wrangler has 123,000 miles and has never had a tune-up. Recently the engine has been running sluggish so I dumped a can in with the gas, and since then the engine is running almost like new. Noticeably more power and smoother running. When I checked around my area in New Hampshire for dealers of this product I was surprised to find that only car dealers have it.
customer_reviews.author: edison1135

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for AMG
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. I put it in my W211 E55 AMG, it made the idle smoother and acceleration too. In the past I tried Techron and Seafoam in the tank without such good results. My car has 102k miles
customer_reviews.author: kongo

customer_reviews.title: Overrated - cheaper options out there.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't notice any difference between this and the cheap store-brand fuel additives at the store. I'd just buy the cheapest one you find at your local discount retailer.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Langanki

customer_reviews.title: Mechanics talk about this like it's the stuff of legend
customer_reviews.text: Mechanics talk about this like it's the stuff of legend. One tank later and I can see why. Very helpful in clearing up a delayed crank issue due to an injector. Bought us quite a bit of time for sure.
customer_reviews.author: derek lahair

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: My 2014 Maxima has A continuously variable transmission (CVT), also known as a shiftless transmission. I used this at 50k. It has made a difference in overall pick up and has improved the smoothness of accelerating.
customer_reviews.author: William M. Fettman

customer_reviews.title: Great product at great savings.
customer_reviews.text: Been usi g BG products for over a decade. Same thing dealers use & charge $99 for. Great savings. Prevents a trip to dealer when your car gets sluggish.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Kosor

customer_reviews.title: Indy study's show only additive that really works
customer_reviews.text: If you put anything else in your gas tank you might as well just burn your money it will do the same thing for your auto, don't believe me look this stuff up for reviews on the net Indi study's show how it's the only additive that really works.
customer_reviews.author: Msgt.Z

customer_reviews.title: Very good but expensive.
customer_reviews.text: This is great stuff. Keeps the fuel system clean in all my vehicles. I've been using it for about 15 years with no issues. I just wish it weren't so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cleaver

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use just open pour into tank and drive. I use a can every Spring here in South Texas when the humidity hits 90% on a daily basis. It seems to help dry out the tank while cleaning the entire fuel system.
customer_reviews.author: NeT

customer_reviews.title: My new go to.
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner makes a noticeable difference. Will not fix mechanical problems but did make my fuel gauge more steady. My engines all run smoother after using 2 cans each. One can to 15 gallons of gas two times in a row and all 3 rigs run smoother.
customer_reviews.author: Jake - Eagle Point, OR

customer_reviews.title: Wish parts stores carried this stuff..
customer_reviews.text: Ran some of this in my 2011 Genesis Coupe 3.8 and it really seemed to idle better. Plan on running some thru everytime I get my oil changed. Awesome stuff.
customer_reviews.author: M.K. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: RX400h after two tanks of gas, Absolutely no difference, Expensive Placebo
customer_reviews.text: Changed oil and emptied a can of BG 44K before my 560mi road trip. Still averaged 28mpg at the end of the trip and no noticeable change in engine power or performance -- Same as my last oil change without the BG 44K. So much for an expensive placebo...
customer_reviews.author: GoBearsTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: A++
customer_reviews.text: Works great in my Chevy Cruze. After a lot of reading, this is the best fuel cleaner you can buy. It does make a slight difference in mileage. Would recommend to all! A++
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy PM

customer_reviews.title: Curb Your Service Costs
customer_reviews.text: For those who enjoy visiting the dealership and hanging out with buddies, while spending 300+ to have the car engine "service" cleaning... this is not the product for you. If you prefer to save time and money (and know what your doing), this is the best!
customer_reviews.author: onevoicecoints

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Just used it in my 95 Silverado and feel it better a bit more responsive I have 230000 miles on it so I thought it may be good idea to run this BG 44K on it to help clean the fuel system and deposits in the engine.
customer_reviews.author: G shep

customer_reviews.title: The car's feeling like new again
customer_reviews.text: After the winter's worth of 'warm ups' I knew they injectors needed some attenton. I put it into 1/2 tank and let the car warm up 2 days, then added 10 gal and will finish the cycle. The car's feeling like new again, more responsive and better performance overall. I do this annually, and am glad I can find it on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Knudtson

customer_reviews.title: 2 years later, the problem I had is still gone
customer_reviews.text: I put this stuff in my Honda Pilot 2 years ago when it had about 215K. I was consistently unable to start the car when it sat and got cold. One tank of this through seemed to fix the issue, and improved my mpg by 3. Two years later, and at 235K, I still have not seen the starting issue again, it has fixed it for good. Thanks BG!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Always Buy This After Tune Up on FI Motors Even if You Think You Don't Need it!
customer_reviews.text: The best there is. I already knew this though as I've "Bench Tested" this and similar products. Same formula as royal purple but less costly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Performs as expected. Used in my ‘03 Saab with ...
customer_reviews.text: Performs as expected. Used in my ‘03 Saab with 148k on it and it started and idled more smoothly. Don’t know that there was any change in mpg, but that wasn’t what I was looking for. Seems to have cleaned the fuel system quite well.
customer_reviews.author: L. Twitchell

customer_reviews.title: Love your car and your car will love you.
customer_reviews.text: Cannot sing enough praises. I drive a 91 maxima and two of my injectors are bad. I had been told many times that was the reason she ran so rough- but after running bg44ky miliage jumped to close the original expected numbers and idle was not nearly an issue. Granted my engine was pretty dirty when I treated her but I cannot say enough about how amazing this was.
customer_reviews.author: Catnip

customer_reviews.title: BG$$K
customer_reviews.text: Rated the best of any fuel system product. I'll be using it in the near future so I don't have a review to rant and rave about it. I never heard of a complaint other than it cost an arm and a leg, so DO NOT SPILL a drop my friend!
customer_reviews.author: Forgiven

customer_reviews.title: 750 miles) and vehicle seems to idle smoother and I know it runs better on open highway
customer_reviews.text: Installed a can with a fill up to twenty gallons of gas. 14 year old Toyota Tacoma, (69,750 miles) and vehicle seems to idle smoother and I know it runs better on open highway. Will use another can in six months. Cheap insurance for my Silver Ghost.
customer_reviews.author: Camera Man

customer_reviews.title: Results
customer_reviews.text: This is another great product from this amazing line. I've seen drastic changes in performance and mpg. Also their oil additive leaves the engine clean at almost every oil change
customer_reviews.author: Tgc

customer_reviews.title: Works every time...
customer_reviews.text: The car has just over 100K and had started the idle funny. A can of 44K with a full tank and by 1/3 of a tank, the engine is just purring.
customer_reviews.author: David A. McElhannon

customer_reviews.title: Improved mileage overnight
customer_reviews.text: There's a reason every mechanic recommends this product. It's a little pricier than the STP stuff you get at Walmart, but it's worth it and the results are near-immediate.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Worked like magic
customer_reviews.text: Car was running rough with an irregular idle and constantly throwing codes. BG 44K Fuel System Cleaner was suggested by a forum member and despite my skepticism it instantly solved my engine problem. It's quite expensive but cheaper than a visit to the dealer!
customer_reviews.author: Jacek

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bg.44k. In my opinion it's not better than any other fuel treatment. It did not help my car.I won't buy this again..
customer_reviews.author: Danny Williams

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didn't really notice a difference in my 10 yr old truck after use.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: It was recommended by a friend who managed a fleet of police ...
customer_reviews.text: I apply this product to all my vehicles about once a year. It was recommended by a friend who managed a fleet of police vetches
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: BG 44K
customer_reviews.text: My car has about 165,000 miles and the power was getting sluggish. I used your product and I could tell a difference almost immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Miyasato

customer_reviews.title: Part of my yearly maintenance
customer_reviews.text: Every year, I pop a half-can on BG 44K into my '96 Toyota Corolla. It clears up the sluggishness and gets things moving again. Simply put: it does what it says.
customer_reviews.author: T-Russ

customer_reviews.title: What a great product; this stuff is fantastic for cleaning injectors
customer_reviews.text: Having a problem with fuel injection system and did a Google search for a product that cleans fuel injectors. The Google search found FG 44K. I purchased it on Amazon, and added this additive as directed. What a great product; this stuff is fantastic for cleaning injectors. My engine runs like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: used the oil treatment and this and you could hear ...
customer_reviews.text: used the oil treatment and this and you could hear the lifters freeing up while the oil treatment was running. took 4 minutes to hear a difference, after 10 it was as quiet as could be for an 12 year old car.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E.

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to this product by my Dodge dealership. I have used it several times in 2 different vehicles and I am more pleased with the results. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: William Meigs

customer_reviews.title: iight
customer_reviews.text: The can makes it inpossible to use. Would be better if the bottle was different and could fit it gas casket.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Clean Your Fuel
customer_reviews.text: BG44K is amazing. I was introduced to this 20 years ago by a Pontiac mechanic when I was having performance issues with a Grand Prix GTP. It solved the problem and was much cheaper than a fuel/injector service at the dealership. You must add this to a full tank of gas and when the tank gets to half full, refill to full and continue as usual. DO NOT add this to a gas tank that is not full. This is a great price at Amazon. It used to sell for $45 a can.
customer_reviews.author: Hedley W. Davies

product_meta.title: BG 44K Fuel System Cleaner Power Enhancer 11oz.
product_meta.description: Rapidly Cleans Fuel Injectors, Valves and Combustion ChambersOne can treats 20 gallons of gasolineFor gasoline engines onlyThe choice of automotive professionals for over 40 years11 oz. canProduct DescriptionBG 44K fuel system cleaner, added to gasoline, quickly and effectively cleans the entire fuel system, including fuel injectors, intake valves, ports and combustion chambers. Because it provides efficient removal of upper engine deposits, BG 44K reduces problems caused by deposit build-up such as engine surge, stalling, stumble, hesitation and power loss. BG 44K quickly restores engine performance and improves driveability. It will provide quick clean-up of coked fuel injectors and corrosive deposits on the fuel sending unit. It is compatible with all fuel system materials, alcohol-blended fuels, common fuel additives. Contains no alcohol. Catalytic converter, and oxygen sensor safe. 11 oz. can WARNING: This product can expose you to chemicals which is [are] known to the State of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm. For more information go to www.P65Warnings.ca.gov.
